(1) In cases of adoption, an adoptive child and his or her descendants shall have equal succession rights with regard to his or her adoptive parents and their relatives as the adoptive parents' blood children and their descendants.
(2) In cases of adoption, an adoptive child and his or her descendants shall inherit after other adoptive children and their descendants.
(3) In cases of adoption, the adoptive parent and his or her relatives shall be the intestate heirs of the adoptive child's estate.
(4) In cases of adoption, an adoptive child and his or her descendants have no intestate succession right with regard to their blood parents, their descendants and other relatives, and vice versa - an adoptive child's blood parents, their descendants and relatives have no succession right with regard to the adoptive child and his or her descendants.
